
```{r}

#df0=df0%>%select("stp")

table1 <- 
  tbl_summary(
    df1,
    by = case, 
    statistic = list(all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
                     all_categorical() ~ "{n}  ({p}%)"),
    digits = all_continuous() ~ 2,
  ) %>%
  modify_header(label = "**Variable**") %>% # update the column header
  bold_labels() 

table1
```
